INSERT INTO eattogether_room (er_no,ER_MASTER,username,er_title,er_content,er_time,er_tend,er_max,er_postdate) SELECT SEQ_ERR.nextval,#{username},#{store_id},#{ERtitle},#{ERcontent},#{ERtime},#{ER_TEND},#{ERmax},SYSDATE FROM DUAL WHERE NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM eattogether_room WHERE USERNAME = #{store_id} AND ER_MASTER=#{username})
select er_no from eattogether_room where er_master = #{username} and username = #{store_id}
select ER_MASTER from eattogether_room where er_no = #{er_no}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO er_chat(erc_no,er_no,erc_content) SELECT SEQ_ERC.nextval,#{er_no},'어서오세요 같이먹자 채팅방입니다.즐거운 시간되세요!' FROM DUAL WHERE not EXISTS (SELECT * FROM er_chat ec join eattogether_room er on ec.er_no=er.er_no WHERE USERNAME = #{store_id} AND ER_MASTER=#{er_master})
mapper.select: select erc_no from er_chat where er_no = #{er_no}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO er_members (erjoin_num,er_no,username,erjoin_date,erjoin_role,erc_no) SELECT SEQ_ERMEMBERS.nextval,#{er_no},#{username},sysdate,0,#{erc_no} FROM DUAL WHERE NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM er_members em join eattogether_room er on er.er_no=em.er_no WHERE em.USERNAME = #{username} and er.USERNAME=#{store_id})
mapper.update: update er_members set ERJOIN_ROLE = 1 where username = #{username}
